string_table.name: pxabnsnfns00001101101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript:
<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="You are now going to watch a short video of a coaching session where the coach uses several of the techniques we’ve talked about so far. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="You will then watch 3 clips of this video and be asked to identify which techniques the coach uses, so pay careful attention to the powerful questions and how carefully and actively the coach listens to the student’s responses. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click the play button to begin watching the video. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="When you’re finished, click the next button to continue to the next slide. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Click the play button to watch the video and answer the following question: 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Which of the techniques did the coach use in this video? 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Select all that apply, then click submit. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Click the play button to watch the video and answer the following question:

" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Select all that apply, then click submit. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
